Unnamed: 4: an amalgamation of various recipes; -JRR Syväoja

Unnamed: 0: As it appears above, recipe yields how many servings?

In a pot, cook the onion and garlic in butter over low heat for 3 minutes.  Add the next 6 ingredients to the pan.  Cover and simmer it to 10 min. Whisk in most of the cream, leaving some for a drizzle garnish. Blend with immersion blender until uniform. Pour soup into tureens and garnish with a drizzle of the remaining cream. Serve warm.
